xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/216658-A Little Monastery in Tuscany 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/yEpdUPztMOnMjPwasl3YYYRKkr7.jpg It is a brief documentary which records the life of five Augustinian monks in the little monastery of Castelnuovo dell'Abate, a Tuscan village, as well as the everyday life of people in the small town, from farmers to meat-hackers, from wine-makers to wild boar hunters. A Little Monastery in Tuscany
